name: Valannium
description: Valannia is a fantasy gaming ecosystem on Solana that connects multiple titles through a unified player identity, shared asset layer, and on-chain ownership. The project aims to let heroes, units, items, and materials move across games while retaining consistent progression and art direction. Core components include Realms, a browser-based MMO focused on professions, gathering, refining, crafting, and dungeon loops, and Arena, a competitive combat experience developed as a standalone title and linked through account and asset services. A central Portal provides account management, inventory, marketplace access, and cross-game utilities.
